roleset.name: create
roleset.note: INVENT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'invent' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 26.4. (from invent.01-v)
INVENTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, invent.01. Corresponds to VNcls create-26.4, preparing-26.3-1. (from invention.01-n)

example.name: obligatory bell-ringing example
example.text: Change-ringing, a mind-boggling exercise *trace* the English invented *trace* 380 years ago, requires physical dexterity -- some bells weigh more than a ton -- combined with intense mental concentration.

example.name: arg0
example.text: That 's an invention of the blog reprinting this .

example.name: both args
example.text: His invention of an iron furnace stove allowed people to warm their homes less dangerously and with less wood.
